LESSON.HEADINGS: <1>Now you'll learn some mathematical symbols.</1> <2>Next, let's learn brackets and parentheses.</2> <3>Now, practice using hyphens and underscores.</3> <4>Finally, lets' go through all the special characters.</4>
LESSON.DESCRIPTION: The fourteenth lesson teaches you some more special characters.

TASK.TEXT: He (sometimes) liked to comment (inappropriately) to his
young (but canny) secretary about his (curious) interests.
Sometimes in text-based docs, _underscores_ are used to
indicate italics, to show _emphasis_ on words or phrases.
Hyphens, as in Startford-upon-Avon, are not the same.
